SUMMARY: REQUIRED | OPTIONAL DETAIL: ELEMENT

br.com.caelum.vraptor
Annotation Type Lazy

@Documented
@Retention(value=RUNTIME)
@Target(value=TYPE)
public @interface Lazy

Identifies that given class should be used with a lazy strategy. On an Interceptor, it means that it should only be instantiated if the Interceptor.accepts(br.com.caelum.vraptor.resource.ResourceMethod) method returns true. In this case, the Interceptor.accepts(br.com.caelum.vraptor.resource.ResourceMethod) should only depend on the received ResourceMethod.

Since:
3.2.0
Author:
Lucas Cavalcanti, Alberto Souza
